overview: Playboy TV has discerned the best and the brightest of the amateur erotic videos that flood their offices every month. Of the thousands of girls looking for the opportunity to be on Playboy's SEXY GIRLS NEXT DOOR, 10 made it onto this compilation, and these girls revel in their chance to bare all for an appreciative audience. Showing their stuff in the shower, the bedroom, their cars, and sometimes in very public locales, these girls more than fulfill the fantasy of the naughty girl next door. Making an appearance are the beautiful Liza Hartling, Jelena Jensen, Jessica Kershner, Anika Knudsen, Ashley Puida, Verneesha Shea, Allyssa Lovelace, Giana Taylor, Marissa Renee, and Sasha Singleton.
title: Playboy: Sexiest Amateur Home Videos
